flags-dir.name: flags-dir
flags-dir.summary: Import flag values from a directory.

target-org.name: target-org
target-org.summary: Username or alias of the target org. Not required if the `target-org` configuration variable is already set.

target-label-name.description: custom label api name(s). Comma-separated for multiple labels.
target-label-name.name: target-label-name
target-label-name.summary: custom label api name(s). Comma-separated for multiple labels.

target-label-value.description: custom label value(s). Use 'label1:value1,label2:value2' format for multiple labels.

target-label-value.summary: custom label value(s). Use 'label1:value1,label2:value2' format for multiple labels.
